Name: Daiquiri Authentico
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: A lightly peppermint spiced influenced Daiquiri.
History: A simplification of a drink created in 2008 by Erik Lorincz at Purple Bar, Sanderson Hotel, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Daiquiri Authentico contains 178 calories
